attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLGcy6VPi5bfK9tBF6g_description
attribs.current: The clockwork myrmidon makes two attacks: two pick attacks or two slam attacks, or one of each.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLGcy6WItP3BlLBiSZf_description
attribs.current: The clockwork myrmidon can spew a jet of alchemical fire in a line 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Any creature in the path of the jet takes 26 (4d12) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. The clockwork myrmidon can use this attack four times before its internal reservoir is emptied.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLGcy6WItP3BlLBiSZg_description
attribs.current: As a bonus action, the clockwork myrmidon’s chest can fire a spray of alchemical grease with a range of 30 feet, covering a 10-by-10 foot square area and turning it into difficult terrain. Each creature standing in the affected area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. The clockwork myrmidon can use this attack four times before its internal reservoir is emptied.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLGcy6WItP3BlLBiSZh_description
attribs.current: The clockwork myrmidon’s alchemical flame reservoir explodes when the construct is destroyed, spraying nearby creatures with burning fuel. A creature within 5 feet of the myrmidon takes 19 (3d12) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. This explosion doesn’t occur if the clockwork myrmidon has already fired its alchemical flame jet four times.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLGcy6WItP3BlLBiSZi_description
attribs.current: The clockwork myrmidon is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLGcy6WItP3BlLBiSZj_description
attribs.current: The clockwork myrmidon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLGd1NAMUMDEWmKEGbb_description
attribs.current: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLGdDO5-r5gQkDf4JaS_description
attribs.current: The golem makes two slam attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLGdDO5-r5gQkDf4JaT_description
attribs.current: On hit, the target must make a successful DC 17 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of exhaustion

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLGdDO5-r5gQkDf4JaU_description
attribs.current: Any time the golem is hit in combat, thousands of tiny salt crystals erupt from its body. All creatures within 5 feet of the golem must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or become blinded for 1d3 rounds.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLGdDO5-r5gQkDf4JaV_description
attribs.current: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLGdDO5-r5gQkDf4JaW_description
attribs.current: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLGdDO5-r5gQkDf4JaX_description
attribs.current: The golem’s weapon attacks are magical.

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

attribs.name: npc_immunities
attribs.current: fire, poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren’t adamantine

attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: understands the language of its creator but can’t speak
